movies.title: La calle sin sol
movies.plot: Mauricio is a Frenchman who arrived in Barcelona fleeing from justice. He takes refuge in a pension in Chinatown (today called Raval) and falls in love with Pilar, the niece of the owner. Soon after, a murder is committed in the neighborhood and Mauricio, whose past is dark enough, it becomes the prime suspect.
movies.simplePlot: Mauricio is a Frenchman who arrived in Barcelona fleeing from justice. He takes refuge in a pension in Chinatown (today called Raval) and falls in love with Pilar, the niece of the owner. ...

biography.birthName: Virgen de los Desamparados Rivelles Ladrón de Guevara
biography.bio: Amparo Rivelles was born on February 11, 1925 in Madrid, Spain as Virgen de los Desamparados Rivelles Ladrón de Guevara. She was an actress, known for La fe (1947), La calle sin sol (1948) and The Nail (1944). She died on November 7, 2013 in Madrid, Madrid.
biography.name: Amparo Rivelles

biography.bio: Antonio Vilar was born on October 13, 1912 in Lisbon, Portugal as Antonio Vilar Justiniano dos Santos. He is known for his work on El príncipe encadenado (1960), Le Judas (1952) and Embajadores en el infierno (1956). He died on August 16, 1995 in Madrid, Spain.
biography.name: Antonio Vilar

biography.bio: He founded with Luis Escobar the 'Teatro Espanol de la Falange'. He began there as an actor. His debut in cinema was in 1939.
biography.name: Manolo Morán

biography.bio: Alberto Romea was born on January 16, 1882 in Madrid, Spain as Alberto Romea Catalina. He was an actor, known for Welcome Mr. Marshall! (1953), Les jeudis miraculeux (1957) and I Was a Parish Priest (1953). He died on April 14, 1960 in Madrid.
biography.name: Alberto Romea

biography.bio: Fernando Fernández de Córdoba was born on November 28, 1897 in Madrid, Madrid, Spain. He was an actor and writer, known for Bambú (1945), Rumbo (1950) and La calle sin sol (1948). He died on February 28, 1982 in Madrid.
biography.name: Fernando Fernández de Córdoba

biography.bio: Ángel de Andrés was born on May 25, 1918 in Madrid, Spain as Angel de Andrés Miquel. He was an actor and writer, known for Esquilache (1989), Historias de la radio (1955) and El hincha (1958). He was married to Conchita Juárez. He died on August 5, 2006 in Madrid, Comunidad de Madrid, Spain.
biography.name: Ángel de Andrés

biography.bio: Irene Caba Alba was born on August 25, 1905 in Buenos Aires, Argentina. She was an actress, known for Bonjour la chance (1957), Las inquietudes de Shanti Andía (1947) and The Nail (1944). She was married to Emilio Gutiérrez. She died on January 14, 1957 in Madrid, Madrid, Spain.
biography.name: Irene Caba Alba

biography.bio: Julia Caba Alba was born on July 31, 1912 in Madrid, Spain. She was an actress, known for Le bourreau (1963), Los pajaritos (1974) and Maribel and the Strange Family (1960). She was married to Manuel San Román. She died on November 14, 1988 in Madrid.
biography.name: Julia Caba Alba

biography.bio: Félix Fernández was born on July 21, 1899 in Cangas de Onís, Oviedo, Spain as Félix Fernández García. He was an actor, known for Welcome Mr. Marshall! (1953), The Rocket from Calabuch (1956) and ¿Crimen imposible? (1954). He was married to Irene Guerrero de Luna. He died on July 9, 1966 in Madrid, Madrid, Spain.
biography.name: Félix Fernández

biography.birthName: José María Prada de la Vega
biography.bio: José Prada was born on November 15, 1891 in Toledo, Castilla-La Mancha, Spain as José María Prada de la Vega. He was an actor, known for La vengeance (1958), Déracinés (1951) and Death of a Cyclist (1955). He died on August 19, 1983 in Madrid, Spain.
biography.name: José Prada

biography.bio: Rufino Inglés was born on November 10, 1902 in Madrid, Madrid, Spain as Rufino Inglés García. He was an actor, known for Tombs of the Blind Dead (1972), Death of a Cyclist (1955) and Marcelin, pain et vin (1955). He died on November 2, 1981 in Madrid.
biography.name: Rufino Inglés

biography.bio: Juana Mansó was born in 1872 in Madrid, Spain. She was an actress, known for Carnival Sunday (1945), La vida en un hilo (1945) and Nada (1947). She died on February 25, 1957 in Madrid.
biography.name: Juana Mansó

biography.bio: Casimiro Hurtado was born on August 8, 1891 in Fuengirola, Málaga, Andalucía, Spain as Casimiro Hurtado de Luna. He was an actor, known for The Rocket from Calabuch (1956), Déracinés (1951) and Un caballero andaluz (1954). He died on February 26, 1967 in Madrid, Madrid, Spain.
biography.name: Casimiro Hurtado

biography.bio: Santiago Rivero is an actor, known for Crónicas de un pueblo (1971), Le plus bel amour de Don Juan (1950) and Whom God Forgives (1957).
biography.name: Santiago Rivero

biography.bio: Chotis is an actor, known for La calle sin sol (1948).
biography.name: Chotis

titlesAwards.titleAwardOutcome: Won Prize of the National Syndicate of Spectacle
